adDetails: 81 horse track tractor with 24 inch tracks for slope grading. Set up existing property for proper grade 2 percent fall away from house. French drain systems to collect water and conduct to street. landscape contractor,conducting business for 30 years,owning a nursery 25 years . We have 35+ years of designing and building custom landscapes for our customers.With owning a nursery since 1989, we have gained vast experience in plant materials and all aspects of landscaping and horticulture. We have solutions to all problem situations such as deer resistant plant materials, problem soils, and low water demand. We have developed planting protocol that works with limited plant death. Also extensive knowledge in nutrients/ nutrient deficiencies, fertilizers/ and fertilizer injector systems to maximize plant growth. We take the time and effort to build the garden of your dreams. -30 years in business -Complete landscape design and install. -Irrigation systems /troubleshooting. -Rock walls, retaining walls and hardscapes. -Tree services -Soil conditioning -willing to travel if necessary. -Hundreds of references available upon request. -EMERGENCY services available immediately. -Call now for a free estimate show contact info http://cottagenursery.com/
